subject: Tennis
Olympic Games (2008)
lead_paragraph: The surprise was that not one of the medalists was named Maria Sharapova or Svetlana Kuznetsova, the country’s two top-five players with Grand Slam victories to their credit.
snippet: The surprise was that not one of the medalists was named Maria Sharapova or Svetlana Kuznetsova, the country’s two top-five players with Grand Slam victories to their credit.
